commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Phew, that should wrap up sweeping the grounds. It feels so much nicer when it's all clean. All right, one more push.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nozomiii!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Oh, Nico-chi! Did you come to pray or something?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Sort of. Anyway, are you done with your shrine duties yet?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Well... I think I'm almost done. What's the matter?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I want you to join me somewhere.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Hmm? It's not every day that you're so upfront and honest about what you want. You'd be so much cuter if you were always like that.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Sh-Shut it! Anyway! Come with me once you're done helping around the shrine!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So, I'm here, but... This is a shopping center. Am I supposed to help you shop?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nope. I want your help with the lottery they're holding here!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: They have a bunch of prizes: food, electronics, living ware, but I'm aiming for the grand prize! A ticket to a ryokan inn with hot springs that'll make my skin silky smooth!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The number one greatest idol in all the universe, Nico, has to win it so she can shine even brighter! Nozomi! Lend me your spiritual power!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Chuckle* I see. So that's what this is all about. Okay, I'll lend you as much as you like. Do you want me to spin the lottery wheel?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: No, I'll do that myself. Victory only tastes sweet when you obtain it with your own two hands!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: That's the spirit! All right, then I'll be cheering for you from the sidelines.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Okay, here goes nothing! All these tickets I saved up were for this very moment! All so I could win that dazzling grand prize!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Wow, that's so many.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Oh? That shop clerk...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What, you see someone you know?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Yeah. There's a clerk who visits our shrine pretty often over there. Mind if I go say hi?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Sure. That spiritual power of yours is firmly imbued in me! By the time you get back, that hot springs trip will be mine!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* Then I'll have to think of how to congratulate you. I'll be back soon.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: *Whimper*

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Nico-chi, I'm back... Wait, what's wrong? What's with all the tissue packets?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The lottery! Every spin! It was participation prize after participation prize!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: What? Every single spin? But you had close to thirty tickets. I wasn't even gone for five minutes. How fast were you spinning?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: AAARGH! This is the worst. How could this happen? I brought you with me and everything! Were all the days I spent collecting the lottery tickets a waste?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Er... Maybe I should have stayed here with you after all. I'm so sorry.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Huh? Nico-chi! There's something sticking out of your pocket. Could it be?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hm? Oh, this is a lottery ticket! I had one more left!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I'm glad. Fate must have gifted you one more chance. Nico-chi, give me your hand.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: M-My hand?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: We'll hold hands like this, and I'll give you tons of spiritual power. Now, Nico-chi. Spin the wheel!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: A-All right... HERE WE GOOOOOO!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It's out! And it's...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: G-Gold... Gold! Yes! I got the grand prize!
